strategy: An unmixed Daemonic Incursion army (only consisting of daemonic formations belonging to a single Chaos Power) has a Strategy Rating of 1, while a mixed Daemonic Incursion army has a Strategy Rating of 0.
Initiative: Exalted Greater Daemon formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on a Daemonic Incursion, aided and abetted by the Lost and the Damned.

units: Herald of Slaanesh on Seeker Chariot
Herald of Nurgle on Blight Fly
Herald of Khorne on Skull Cannon
Herald of Tzeentch on Burning Chariot

sections.name: Daemonic Incursion Specials
sections.description: The Army must include one Chaos Gate.

formations.name: 1 Chaos Gate
formations.units: Replace the Blitz objective marker in the Daemonic Incursion player's half of the table with a Chaos Gate. It counts both as an objective and a Chaos Gate.

sections.name: 1+ Exalted Greater Daemons. Max one for each part of 1500 points in the army.
Daemon Legions
sections.description: Any number of Daemon Legion formations may be taken.

formations.name: Slaneesh Legion of Excess
formations.units: Two Herald of Slaanesh, five Lesser Daemon Pool points
extraUnits: Replace two Herald of Slaanesh with a Keeper of Secrets: 125 points
Replace two Herald of Slaanesh with two Herald of Slaanesh on Seeker Chariot: 25 points

formations.name: Nurgle Plague Legion
formations.units: Two Herald of Nurgle on Palanquin, five Lesser Daemon Pool points
extraUnits: Replace two Herald of Nurgle on Palanquin with a Great Unclean One: 125 points
Replace two Herald of Nurgle on Palanquin with two Herald of Nurgle on Blight Fly: 25 points

formations.name: Khorne Blood Legion
formations.units: Two Herald of Khorne on Juggernauts, five Lesser Daemon Pool points
extraUnits: Replace two Herald of Khorne on Juggernaut with a Bloodthirster: 150 points
Replace two Herald of Khorne on Juggernaut with two Herald of Khorne on Skull Cannon: 25 points

formations.name: Tzeentch Scintillating Legion
formations.units: Two Herald of Tzeentch, five Lesser Daemon Pool points
extraUnits: Replace two Herald of Tzeentch with a Lord of Change: 150 points
Replace two Herald of Tzeentch with two Herald of Tzeentch on Burning Chariot: 25 points

sections.name: Mortals and Daemon Engines
sections.description: Up to half of the points available may be spent on Mortals and Daemon Engines formations.

formations.name: Cultist Coven
formations.units: Daemonic Pact, Aspiring Champion, nine Chaos Cultists and/or Mutants

sections.name: Daemon Pool
sections.description: Any amount may be spent on Daemon Pool points

formations.name: Lesser Daemon Pool
formations.units: Any amount of Lesser Daemon Pool points

upgrades.title: Daemonic Incursion Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: Soul Grinder
items.description: Add up to two Soul Grinders

items.name: Big Mutants
items.description: Replace up to four Cultists/Mutants with Big Mutants

items.name: Chaos Hounds
items.description: Add up to three Chaos Hounds

items.name: Land Transporters
items.description: Add enough Land Transporters to transport the formation
